title: Looking at Britain: Young Farmers Clubs
creator_credit: Max Munden Productions and Maxwell Munden
brief_description: Farmers display cattle, sheep, produce at Kent County Federation of Young Farmers Clubs. Shows young farmers conducting their own school farm; visiting various farms, research stations and orchards.
